name: Reckless Racing (itch)
description:
Simple game made for Godot Wild Jam #3 THEME:  Pick your poison

It's a racing game where all cars have a distinct crippling disadvantage, try to beat your own time or race against a friend!

It has support for 2 player local multiplayer (split-screen), and currently only features one track and five cars.

I made this using Godot Engine 3.1

Input

ESC to go back to main menu

Player 1:

  • Arrow keys for movement
  •  -  (Minus key) to restart car    (this might be a bit uncomfortable for US keyboards)

Player 2:

  • W  A  S  D for movement
  • Q to restart car

This is my first successful attempt at creating a videogame, so please forgive me if it's too glitchy or it doesn't work!
